event.title: the nearby Swan Reach run in 1857

data.event: The township got its name from John Johnson, a man of Scandinavian origins, who purchased the nearby Swan Reach run in 1857 which also encompassed Johnsonville and surrounding areas.

event.title: had answered Johnson's advertisement early in 1855

data.event: Arthur Orton had answered Johnson's advertisement early in 1855 calling for splitters, fence riders and stock-riders on his Mewburn Park station.
